contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated in active form. Alternate translation: "people can hear the sound of doves" or "the doves are cooing" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: the sound of the doves is heard

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated in active form. Alternate translation: "a flock of ewes whose wool people have cut off" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: a flock of newly shorn ewes

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated in active form. Alternate translation: "people would completely despise him" or "people would harshly ridicule him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: the offer would utterly be despised
